title: Status Update: Minor visual improvements
body_html:
As mentioned in this pull request (#268), there are definitely some minor improvements that could be made to the status_update, to make it more user-friendly. Here are a couple of things I noticed need work:

  • on the status_updates new view, the buttons "Create Activity" and "Back" should be aligned. Ideally, "Create" Activity could even have a color (like green) to show that it's the 'positive' action.
  • the table on the index view is pretty ugly, and the date as well as title columns are pretty narrow in comparison to the text column.

This issue is also linked to #274

As mentioned in this pull request (https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/268), there are definitely some minor improvements that could be made to the `status_update`, to make it more user-friendly. Here are a couple of things I noticed need work:
- on the `status_updates` new view, the buttons "Create Activity" and "Back" should be aligned. Ideally, "Create" Activity could even have a color (like green) to show that it's the 'positive' action.
- the table on the index view is pretty ugly, and the date as well as title columns are pretty narrow in comparison to the text column. 

This issue is also linked to https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/issues/274
